FindSDL2.cmake

Found at:
https://github.com/Twinklebear/TwinklebearDev-Lessons/blob/master/cmake/FindSDL2.cmake
(Twinklebear-Dev SDL tutorials)

License:

Probably BSD "the license" to Kitware, but it seems to have been modified by a number of people since then so I don't really know.


FindSDL2_mixer.cmake

Found at:
https://github.com/dorkster/flare-engine-next/blob/master/cmake/FindSDL2_mixer.cmake
and then modified by me

License:

Seems to have been created by Justin Jacobs (https://github.com/dorkster), license is BSD "the license".
